descriptor.name: Pradhan Mantri Suraksha Bima Yojana (PMSBY) Enrollment Guide
descriptor.short_desc: A course on helping citizens enroll in the government's low-cost accidental insurance scheme, PMSBY.
descriptor.long_desc:
Course Overview:
This module provides a complete guide to the Pradhan Mantri Suraksha Bima Yojana (PMSBY), a government-backed accident insurance scheme. Agents will learn the scheme's features, benefits, and the simple enrollment process to help citizens secure vital financial protection against unforeseen accidents.

  1. Scheme Benefits & Premium:
    Understand the insurance coverage: ₹2 Lakh for accidental death or total permanent disability, and ₹1 Lakh for partial permanent disability, all for a nominal annual premium of just ₹20.
  2. Eligibility Criteria:
    Master the straightforward eligibility rules. Any Indian citizen between the ages of 18 and 70 with a savings bank account is eligible to join this scheme.
  3. Enrollment Process:
    Learn the auto-debit enrollment process. The premium is automatically deducted from the subscriber's bank account, making it a hassle-free way to maintain coverage.

Why Take This Course:

  • Provide a crucial financial safety net to citizens, especially those in the unorganized sector.
  • Specialize in a high-volume, high-impact national social security scheme.
  • Help citizens secure their family's future with an affordable and accessible insurance product.

descriptor.name: Haqdarshak
descriptor.short_desc: A social enterprise connecting citizens with their eligible government welfare schemes.
descriptor.long_desc: Haqdarshak is a tech platform that bridges the information and access gap between citizens and social protection services. We use an assisted-tech model with trained agents to provide last-mile support for discovering and applying for government and private welfare schemes.
